an5.102:1.1: “Mendicants, even if a monk is of impeccable character, he might be suspected and distrusted as a ‘bad monk’ for five reasons.
an5.102:2.2: It’s when a monk frequently collects alms from prostitutes, widows, voluptuous girls, eunuchs, or nuns.
an5.102:3.1: Even if a monk is of impeccable character, he might be suspected and distrusted as a ‘bad monk’ for these five reasons.”
